name: Frost Monster - White and Lilac Stuffed Toy Monster Collectible
description:
This cute plush toy is from my Frost Monster Series and the yeti was my inspiration for these little creatures. The main body of this little lady is made with a white fun fur. Her face, hands and feet are made with a lilac polyester fleece.

She measures approximately 9" (or 23 cm) tall from the top of her head to her cute little feet. Her eyes are appliqued on and the little white highlights (in her eyes) are done by hand.

Firmly stuffed with 100% polyester stuffing - all new materials.

Hand Sewn and Machine Sewn

Note that this toy is made to order and the turnaround time is 5-10 business days. Recommended for Ages 5 and up.

As with every plush character by Stuffed Silly, these Frost Monsters are my original designs, patterned and made by me. A lot of love and care goes into making each one of these cute creations. Â© 2008-2013 Stuffed Silly, All rights reserved
